sentences.en: "Don't ask," he said, whenever Ginny ventured to raise the subject.
sentences.cn: 每当金尼鼓起勇气提起这个话题时，他就说“不要问”。

sentences.en: a campaign to raise awareness of meningitis
sentences.cn: 增强脑膜炎防治意识的活动

sentences.en: a concert to raise money for charity
sentences.cn: 筹募善款的音乐会

sentences.en: Agents will raise the issue of prize-money for next year's world championships.
sentences.cn: 经纪人将提出下年度世锦赛奖金的问题。

sentences.en: Betty raised the important question of who will be in charge.
sentences.cn: 贝蒂提出了一个重要问题，就是将由谁来负责。

sentences.en: Can you raise the lamp so I can see?
sentences.cn: 你能把灯举高点好让我看清吗？

sentences.en: Do not raise your left arm above the horizontal.
sentences.cn: 左臂不要举过水平高度。

sentences.en: Don't you raise your voice to me, Henry Rollins!
sentences.cn: 别冲我叫嚷，亨利·罗林斯！

sentences.en: Dr Hayward intends to raise the museum’s profile (= make it more well-known ) .
sentences.cn: 海沃德博士想提高博物馆的知名度。

sentences.en: Every year we have charity days to raise money for unfortunate people.
sentences.cn: 每年我们都有慈善日来筹款帮助贫困人群。

sentences.en: He did not raise the subject again.
sentences.cn: 他再也没有提起这个话题。

sentences.en: He raised cattle in Nebraska when he was young.
sentences.cn: 他年轻时在内布拉斯加州养过牛。

sentences.en: I &B{raised my glass to} Susan.
sentences.cn: 我举杯向苏珊祝酒。

sentences.en: I am organising a benefit gig in Bristol to raise these funds.
sentences.cn: 我要在布里斯托尔组织一场义演来募集这些资金。

sentences.en: I’d like to raise the issue of publicity.
sentences.cn: 我想提一提宣传问题。

sentences.en: Large supplemental doses of vitamin E can slightly raise blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 大剂量补充维生素E可能会造成血压偏高。

sentences.en: Many shops have raised their prices.
sentences.cn: 很多商店都提价了。

sentences.en: Oh boy, this record's going to raise a few hackles.
sentences.cn: 哎，这张唱片会激怒一些人的。

sentences.en: Raise one foot, curl the toes and point the foot down-wards.
sentences.cn: 抬起一只脚，弯曲脚趾，使脚尖朝下。

sentences.en: Raise your hand if you know the right answer.
sentences.cn: 知道正确答案的话，请举手。

sentences.en: she raised her hand to me.
sentences.cn: 她朝我举起拳头。

sentences.en: She was apt to raise her voice and wave her hands about.
sentences.cn: 她动不动就拔高嗓门，并挥舞双手。

sentences.en: Stan’s dad died, leaving his mother to raise three sons alone.
sentences.cn: 斯坦的父亲去世了，留下他母亲独自抚养三个儿子。

sentences.en: Tanks raise huge trails of dust when they move.
sentences.cn: 坦克开动时扬起大量尘土。

sentences.en: The hoped-for result is to raise $106 million next year.
sentences.cn: 期望的目标是明年能筹集到1.06亿美元。

sentences.en: The object of the exercise is to raise money for the charity.
sentences.cn: 那样做旨在筹集善款。

sentences.en: The Republic of Ireland is expected to raise interest rates.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰共和国预计会提高利率。

sentences.en: The Trust hopes to raise $1 million to buy land.
sentences.cn: 这家信托机构希望能筹集到一百万美元购置土地。

sentences.en: The Trust hopes to raise 1 million to buy land.
sentences.cn: 这家信托机构希望能筹集到一百万美元购置土地。

sentences.en: The university is working to raise the number of students from state schools.
sentences.cn: 这所大学正在努力增加公立学校学生的入学人数。

sentences.en: They are raising funds to help needy youngsters.
sentences.cn: 他们正在筹款帮助贫困青少年。

sentences.en: This tax would raise petrol prices by about 3.5p per litre.
sentences.cn: 这项税收会使每升汽油价格提高约3.5便士。

sentences.en: to raise doubts in people's minds
sentences.cn: 引起人们的怀疑

sentences.en: to raise salaries/prices/taxes
sentences.cn: 提高薪水 / 价格 / 税金

sentences.en: when I finally scored the fans raised the roof.
sentences.cn: 当我最终进球时，球迷们像炸开了锅一样。

sentences.en: William raised his hat and smiled at her.
sentences.cn: 威廉抬一抬帽子，朝她笑了笑。

words.tran_cn: 提高（raise的过去时和过去分词）；举起

phrases.phrase: raise Cain 或 raise the devil  或 raise hell

phrases.tran_cn: 使不满，使不快：引起惊奇或轻微的不满
喧闹不休；闹翻了天；吵翻了天
增加困难，增加义务：增加某人的义务或财政困难

加剧敌对情绪;加剧紧张气氛:

The chairman's speech raised the temperature of the meeting.
主席的发言使会议的气氛顿时紧张起来。[见temperature]

trans.tran_en: an increase in the money you earn

trans.tran_cn: 提升，举起，站立，增加，提高，筹集，组建，提起，导致，引起，抚养，饲养，培育，解除
trans.tran_en: to move or lift something to a higher position, place, or level

trans.tran_cn: 举起； 提高， 使升高； 饲养， 养育
trans.tran_en: to move or lift something to a higher position, place, or level
